question: Nikol Pashinyan was elected as new prime minister of ___________.
explanation: Nikol Pashinyan was elected as new prime minister of Armenia. Armenia's parliament elected Nikol Pashinyan as new prime minister in a 59-42 vote. His election comes after Serzh Sargsyan's resignation as Prime minister of Armenia recently. Nikol Pashinyan is 42 years old. He is the leader of Civil Contract party. He is a former newspaper editor. He started a protest movement with a march of non-violence on 31st March 2018 demanding Serzh Sargsyan to reisgn.
